title: ICYMI: The Instagram Feed We Thought We Wanted
description:
This week, Instagram announced the return of chronological feeds to the platform, allowing users to toggle between the standard algorithmic feed and two separate chronological ones. On the show today, Madison and Rachelle talk about these new changes, whether we really want newsfeeds with such a strict structure, and why, regardless of which way we go, we’re still at the will of the algorithm.
Podcast production by Daniel Schroeder.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:author: Slate Podcasts
itunes:subtitle: We love chronology—until we don’t.
